products.name: Red Delicious Apple
products.description: Crisp, juicy apples with a perfect balance of sweetness and tartness. Grown in local orchards and harvested at peak ripeness. Ideal for snacking, baking, or juicing.

products.name: Cavendish Banana
products.description: Creamy, sweet bananas rich in potassium. Perfect for smoothies, baking, or a quick energy boost. Ethically sourced from sustainable farms.

products.name: Valencia Orange
products.description: Juicy, seedless oranges bursting with vitamin C. Great for fresh juice, salads, or zesting. Picked at perfect ripeness for maximum flavor.

products.name: Strawberry
products.description: Plump, red strawberries with intense sweetness. Hand-picked daily for freshness. Perfect for desserts, jams, or eating fresh with cream.

products.name: Kiwi
products.description: Fuzzy brown exterior with vibrant green flesh. Tropical sweetness with a hint of tartness. Rich in vitamin C and fiber. Ready-to-eat when slightly soft.

products.name: Mango
products.description: Buttery-smooth flesh with honey-like sweetness. The 'king of fruits' is perfect for smoothies, salsas, or eating fresh. Ripens at room temperature.

products.name: Lemon
products.description: Bright, acidic lemons with fragrant zest. Essential for cooking, baking, cocktails, and home remedies. High juice content with thin rind.

products.name: Blueberry
products.description: Small berries packed with antioxidants. Sweet with a slight tartness. Excellent for pancakes, muffins, or as a healthy snack. Frozen immediately after picking.
